meanings.definition: Of or relating to the Roman festival of Saturnalia.
meanings.sent1: During the saturnalian celebration, people wore colorful clothes and sang joyfully.
meanings.sent2: The saturnalian decorations filled the streets with lights and laughter.
meanings.sent3: The saturnalian feast was so grand that even the birds joined in the merriment.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter echoed through the room, creating a saturnalian atmosphere.
meanings.sent5: The saturnalian spirit of the festival brought smiles to everyone's faces.

meanings.definition: Characterized by unrestrained revelry and excess.
meanings.sent1: The party turned saturnalian as the music got louder and the dancing more energetic.
meanings.sent2: His saturnalian behavior at the party shocked the more reserved guests.
meanings.sent3: The saturnalian antics of the children running around the house made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: The city streets transformed into a saturnalian playground of lights and music.
meanings.sent5: The atmosphere was so saturnalian that even the shyest person couldn't resist joining the fun.
